about_the_game:
The character controlled by the player will attempt to steal cheeses in various locations and earn points as they steal. However, each theft will attract a cat to chase the player. The player’s objective is to steal as many cheeses as possible and earn the highest score possible without being caught by the cat.

Gameplay: The game takes place on a map. The map consists of various areas with different difficulty levels and locations where cheeses are found. The player can choose between characters or create a customizable character.

At the beginning of the game, the player is placed in an area and begins to see the surrounding cheeses. The player directs their character towards the cheeses and attempts to steal them. Each time a cheese is stolen, the player earns a certain number of points.

However, each theft operation attracts the attention of the cat. With each point earned, the cat begins to move towards the player’s location. The player must be careful and avoid contact with the cat.

The game becomes harder over time. As more cheeses are stolen, the cat moves faster, making it harder for the player to escape. Additionally, some cheeses are more valuable and stealing them earns the player more points, but also carries a higher risk of being caught by the cat.

The objective of the game is to achieve the highest score possible within the specified time period and avoid being caught by the cat. At the end of the game, the player’s scores are displayed in a ranking, creating competition among players.

name: Hungry Mouse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

short_description: We control a mouse and try to steal cheeses on the ground, earning points as we steal. However, as we earn points, a cat starts chasing us.
